NetworkSessionProviderUsers.description: List of assoc arrays containing 'username', 'ip_ranges' and 'token'  keys configuring the list of users

NetworkSessionProviderAllowedUserRights.description: List of strings to limit user rights to. This does not grant any rights the user doesn't already have. Defaults to null, meaning no limits

NetworkSessionProviderCanAlwaysAutocreat.description: When true the provider will bypass account creation authorization. Defaults to false, meaning standard anonymous user account creation limits apply.
